front.title: IEC/IEEE Draft International Standard

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard is to be read in conjunction with IEC 62271-1:20xx17, to which it refers and which is applicable unless otherwise specified in this standard. In order to simplify the indication of corresponding requirements, the same numbering of clauses and subclauses is used as in IEC 62271-1. Amendments to these clauses and subclauses are given under the same references whilst additional subclauses are numbered from 101.
